job_history.role_name: Bilingual Language Arts Sixth Grade Teacher
job_history.work_description: Developed and implemented interesting and interactive learning mediums to increase student understanding of course materials and build community within the classroom. Participate in the development of intervention plans for students within the classroom setting, during MVP time (tutoring hour) as well as after school tutoring. Oversee Read 180 program participants and monitor their progress as part of their intervention strategy. Implementation of newer educational technology programs in order to teach students new techniques to use within their presentations to showcase their knowledge.

Worked in elementary schools and substitute several classroom programs inclusive of: Early Childhood-6 mainstream, Spanish Immersion, Bilingual (Spanish) Early Childhood-6, and Special Education. Provided key support for teachers on leave.

Developed and implemented plans inclusive of: following Independent Education Plans (Special Education), Gifted and Talented curriculum, and mainstream English/Spanish language arts, writing and history. Analyze data to plan and implement appropriate instruction to reflect accommodations for individual students. Cooperate with other members of the staff in planning and implementing instructional goals and objectives.

Coordinated community tours for prospective students, families and community visitors. Created data intensive reports based on TAKS/STAAR test results for local feeder schools for supervisor to present to upper administration. Collaborated with the FWISD Vital Link program to create a summer college exploration/internship program for local middle school students.

Assisted students one-on-one with college preparation assignments such as: career exploration, school selection, resume writing, and letters of recommendation. Taught students hybrid course: Introduction to Spanish and Hispanic/Latin American Studies.

Oversaw the development of a start-up organization. Managed a $200,000 federal Gear up grant. Utilized research based best practices to create community workshops for parents and students as well as developed staff and advisor manuals. Developed community partnerships and presented NACRC to organizations.

Taught beginner English grammar and literature, World History and TOEFL Prep to international students. Tutored Algebra and was promoted to remedial math teacher position. Advised international students and tutored Spanish.

skills.name: Teaching
skills.explanation: Has extensive experience in teaching various subjects and age groups, including bilingual and special education, indicating expert-level mastery.

skills.name: Curriculum Development
skills.explanation: Developed and implemented lesson plans and educational programs for multiple subjects and age groups, showing strong proficiency.

skills.name: Classroom Management
skills.explanation: Managed classrooms with diverse student populations, including special education and bilingual students, indicating strong proficiency.

skills.name: Leadership
skills.explanation: Coordinated community tours, created data-intensive reports, and collaborated with other staff members, showing a solid working proficiency in leadership.

skills.name: Project Management
skills.explanation: Oversaw the development of a start-up organization and managed a federal grant, indicating a solid working proficiency in project management.

skills.name: Community Outreach
skills.explanation: Developed community workshops, created community partnerships, and presented to organizations, showing a solid working proficiency in community outreach.

skills.name: Data Analysis
skills.explanation: Analyzed data to plan and implement instruction, but the extent of data analysis experience is not clear, indicating some practical experience.

skills.name: Spanish Language Instruction
skills.explanation: Taught Spanish language and culture, tutored Spanish, and worked with bilingual students, indicating strong proficiency.

skills.name: Academic Advising
skills.explanation: Assisted students with college preparation assignments, indicating a solid working proficiency in academic advising.
